text: Hilary Laing (21 September 1927 - 16 November 2013) was a British alpine skier. She competed in three events at the 1952 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2013 deaths Category:British female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Great Britain Category:Alpine skiers at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Guildford
title: Hilary Laing
